title: 删除二叉搜索树中的节点 (Delete Node in a BST)
content: 思路: // @Title: 删除二叉搜索树中的节点 (Delete Node in a BST) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-16 17:32:48 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 44.9 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { TreeNode parent; public TreeNode deleteNode(TreeNode root, int key) { if(root==null){ return null; } if (root.val == key) { //左右任意节点为空 if (root.left == null || root.right == null) { return root.left == null ? root.right : root.left; }else{ TreeNode cur=root.right; while(cur.left!=null){ cur=cur.left; } cur.left=root.left; return root.right; } } else if (root.val > key) { root.left = deleteNode(root.left, key); } else { root.right = deleteNode(root.right, key); } return root; } }
